description.value:
As a free action, you can increase either your base speed or your swim speed by 10 feet. While swimming, you gain a bonus on Swim checks equal to half your class level (minimum 1). These effects last for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

This power replaces the Icicle power of the Water Domain.
